content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lmtsynapsedlppe.dfs.core.windows.net/lmtsynapsefilesystem/synapse/workspaces/labormangementsynapseppe/warehouse/approval_history/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [year] = 2021 AND [month] = 7 and assignedApprover = 'chfilipc' and labordate >= '2021-07-25T00:00:00' 
and labordate <= '2021-07-31T00:00:00'
ORDER BY labordate DESC
OFFSET (100) ROWS FETCH NEXT (100) ROWS ONLY


-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
   assignedApprover, [month], COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lmtsynapsedlppe.dfs.core.windows.net/lmtsynapsefilesystem/synapse/workspaces/labormangementsynapseppe/warehouse/approval_history/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
Where [year] = 2021 AND [month] = 7 and labordate >= '2021-07-25T00:00:00' and labordate <= '2021-07-31T00:00:00'
GROUP by assignedApprover, [month]
order by COUNT(*) DESC







-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    MIN(_ts)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lmtsynapsedlppe.dfs.core.windows.net/lmtsynapsefilesystem/synapse/workspaces/labormangementsynapseppe/warehouse/approval_history/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [month] = 12 and assignedApprover = 'mayv' and labordate >= '2021-12-05T00:00:00' 
and labordate <= '2021-12-11T00:00:00'


-- This is auto-generated code > 10 sec
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lmtsynapsedlppe.dfs.core.windows.net/lmtsynapsefilesystem/synapse/workspaces/labormangementsynapseppe/warehouse/approval_history_dp_year_pp0/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [year] = 2021 AND [month] = 7 and assignedApprover = 'mayv' and labordate >= '2021-07-05T00:00:00' 
and labordate <= '2021-07-11T00:00:00'





SELECT MAX(_ts) FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lmtsynapsedlppe.dfs.core.windows.net/lmtsynapsefilesystem/synapse/workspaces/labormangementsynapseppe/warehouse/approval_history/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
